title: Deep Search
description: Perform multi-source deep research across the web, academic papers, and databases, then synthesize findings into comprehensive reports
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: multi_source_research
commands.description: Conduct in-depth research across multiple source types

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The research question or topic to investigate

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Research depth: 'quick' (5 min), 'standard' (15 min), 'thorough' (30 min), 'exhaustive' (60 min)

returns.description: Research report with executive summary, detailed findings per source, cross-references, confidence ratings, and bibliography

commands.name: synthesize
commands.description: Synthesize information from multiple provided sources into a coherent analysis

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Array of source objects with url or text content to synthesize

parameters.name: question
parameters.description: The specific question or angle to synthesize around

returns.description: Synthesis report with unified answer, agreement/disagreement matrix, knowledge gaps, and recommended further reading
